channel.title: Decentralize on chuck @ home
channel.description: Recent content in Decentralize on chuck @ home

item.title: A New Reboot
item.description: I’ve been considering my silence on the internet for some time. Aside from a few off-the-public-record services, I’ve managed to maintain a significant level of radio silence. I think I’ve found a topic thats making me willing to break that silence, and has inspired me to put pen to paper again. As the state of my beloved internet careens towards an “all-encompassing” corporate owned experience it makes me weep for what the internet could and probably should be.
